overview: Stunning macro 3D filmmaking takes viewers on an unforgettable journey from lake bottom battles for territory to lovelorn toads searching for a mate to lizards prowling the forest for a meal. We humans are but lumbering, clumsy giants striding through these miniature ecosystems that thrive without us... even in spite of us.
tagline: Venture into tiny kingdoms ruled by thieves, assassins, and gentle souls alike.
title: MicroPlanet 3D
